thread.title: It’s party time! WTM London’s Festival Program returns for a second year
thread.title_full: It’s party time! WTM London’s Festival Program returns for a second year

author: eTN Editor
title: It’s party time! WTM London’s Festival Program returns for a second year
text:
It’s party time! WTM London’s Festival Program returns for a second year   
Oct 19, 2015 eTN   
The World Travel Market (WTM) is ready to party in London during the 2015 WTM event being from November 2-5 at ExCeL – London. 
An array of exhibitors will be partying in style during WTM London’s Festival program on Wednesday, November 4. The festivals give everyone the opportunity to socialize after traditional working hours in a fun and vibrant atmosphere. Those attending will experience the culture, hospitality, and cuisine with each hosting exhibitor offering something unique. 
The Caribbean Tourism Organization (CTO) and Mexico are among many exhibitors that will be hosting WTM London festivals until 8 pm on the Wednesday evening of WTM London. 
India will be showing off its “Taste of India”-themed festival as it portrays the rich cultural heritage of the country. Participants can enjoy the diverse cuisine from every corner of the country, while experiencing live Indian dance and music, and tasting aromatic local Indian wines from the boutique wineries or Indian beer. 
The Polish Tourist Organization and Polish travel industry partners are hosting a Networking Party which will give the opportunity to liaise with the country’s travel industry representatives. There will also be a party atmosphere with Polish hospitality offering local specialties with live music. 
Famous Vietnamese street food is likely to attract plenty of attention as the destination showcases its colorful traditions. 
Nepal’s festival will be focusing on nature, culture, and adventure during its festival, while Indonesia, a country with a rich festival tradition, will demonstrate its diverse country of origins and religions.
